item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: There is a way to open MSDN thread - right near the question mark there is a small caret sign - you can click on it and the thread will be opened inline. I usually open each thread manually by clicking on it, then close and back to the forum, although this is a bit more time consuming method.
item.content:encoded: There is a way to open MSDN thread – right near the question mark there is a small caret sign – you can click on it and the thread will be opened inline. I usually open each thread manually by clicking on it, then close and back to the forum, although this is a bit more time consuming method.

item.title: By: Sarabpreet Singh Anand
item.dc:creator: Sarabpreet Singh Anand
item.content:encoded:
Hi Naomi,

I am following you on MSDN Forums, just wanted a small help- i couldn’t find your Email id so asking the question here.

Is there a easy way to browse through all threads in a forum on MSDN Technet? or we need to open each thread in a different tab in order to browse these.
I am searching an option where i can just open a thread and then directly go to next previous thread.
